title: PM directs mission to facilitate families of 3 Pakistanis died in Dubai fire
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 17 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday instructed the countryâ€™s mission in the United Arab Emirates to facilitate the families of Pakistanis who died in a fire incident in Dubai.
Sixteen people including three Pakistanis lost their lives after a fire broke out in their apartment in Dubai.
The prime minister expressed grief over the deaths and extended his heartfelt condolences to the bereaved families over the tragedy.
